cast.name: 兰斯·亨利克森 Lance Henriksen
斯蒂芬·E·米勒 Stephen E. Miller

director.name: James D. Morris James D. Morris

introduction: Room 19 is a story of guilt, love and redemption as Travis takes us on an emotional journey back through the mysteries of his daughters murder years previously. Once in the room, he finds Katy's soul lingers in the last place she was alive but what is it trying to say? Armed only with his scattered memories, a phone and some cheap alcohol, heart broken Travis unravels the mysteries of that fateful night bringing to the fore the heartache before and after. The private investigator hired, the broken wife, shady motel owner and the mistress all play their roles as Travis's soul is revealed with surprising results. Written by Anon
